Package se.swedenconnect.sigval.report

Interface SigValReportGenerator<R extends ExtendedSigValResult>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSigValReportGenerator
public interface SigValReportGenerator<R extends ExtendedSigValResult>
Interface for creating a signature validation report based on ETSI TS 119 102-2
Author:
Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)

    • getValidationReport

      ValidationReportDocument getValidationReport(SignedDocumentValidationResult<R> validationResult, SigvalReportOptions sigvalReportOptions)
      Provide a signature validation report based on ETSI TS 119 102-2
      Parameters:
      validationResult - the result of signature validation used to generate the report
